Translations.Text: The sinners will be known by their Marks: And they will be caught by their hair and their feet
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
This is the Hell that the sinners (of this world) ignore
In the middle, and (yes) in the middle of boiling hot water will they float around
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
But for him who fears the time when they (the jinns' and men) will stand before (the Throne of Judgment of) their Lord, there will be two Gardens—
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
Containing many kinds (of trees and delights)—
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
In them (each) will be two Springs (of water) flowing (free)
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
In them will be Fruits of every kind, two and two (for sufficiency and completeness)
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
They will recline (and rest) on carpets whose inner lining will be of rich embroidery: The fruit of the Garden will be near, (and easy to reach)
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
In them will be (maidens), chaste, restricting their glances, whom no man or jinn has ever before touched—
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
They are like Rubies and Coral
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
Is there any Reward for good — Other than good
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
And below these two, there are two other Gardens—
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
Dark-green in color (and lush with water)
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
In them (each) will be two Springs with plenty of flowing water
Then which of the miracles from your Lord will you both renounce? —
